job_description: Flight Controls Embedded Software Engineer - job post Tekskills Inc 5025 Chital Dr, Fort Worth, TX 76036 Full-time, Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Full-time Contract Job Title : Flight Controls Embedded Software Engineer Location : Fort Worth, TX (On-site) Duration : Full Time Job Description Description/Comment: This position is located at Customer headquarters facility in Fort Worth, TX (On-site). Must Have: · Practical experience with Matlab/Simulink/Stateflow required. Experience with Embedded Coder and/or Simulink Verification tools a plus. · Programming in C/C++ in embedded environments. · Experience with Ground Control Station development and implementation · Experience with software version control using GitHub or GitLab. · Familiarity with relevant standards such as RTCA DO-178, RTCA DO-331, RTCA DO-254, SAE ARP4754A, SAE ARP4761, 14 CFR Part 27, and Part 29 for commercial and military qualification and certification of aircraft systems. · Experience with real time simulation environments such as Speedgoat or dSPACE a plus Communication Standards such as ARINC 429, RS-232, RS-422, and RS-485. · Familiarity with model-based systems engineering. · Experience with creation of system specifications, requirements traceability, and verification. · Experience at all levels will be considered with a minimum of 5 years specific experience with embedded control software development. Preference will be given for additional work in sensor and actuator controls, avionics, or electrical systems integration, development, and testing. · Customer is seeking an experienced, self-motivated Embedded Controls Software Engineer to join Bell’s Innovation Team. · The embedded controls software role will integrate with technology and vehicle platform development teams with focus on advanced propulsion and fly-by-wire systems. This position will be part of a diverse team of engineers capable of executing in a challenging and fast-paced environment. Responsibilities Include: · Develop embedded software for Flight Control System (FCS) with complex hardware. · Perform formal software development through design for requirements and requirements verification with C/C++ code and MathWorks Matlab & Simulink toolsets. · Develop and update requirements and verification traceability. · Conduct software integration and testing on target hardware. · Develop, implement, document, and review Low-Level Test (LLT) and High-Level Test (HLT) software cases and expected results. · Perform LLT and HLT execution on desktop environment and target electronic hardware integrated with real sensors and actuators in a lab environment . · Develop and implement safety critical control software in both ‘bare metal’ main executives and real time operating system environments. · Design and implement real time embedded control functionality including in-line monitoring, redundancy management, and built-in-test (BIT). · Design and test Flight Control Systems (FCS) with embedded DO-178 and DO-331 software and DO-254 complex electronic hardware. Education Requirements: · Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science required. · Masters or PhD a plus. Skills & Experience C++, MATLAB, MATLAB Simulink Job Types: Full-time, Contract Schedule: 8 hour shift Monday to Friday Ability to commute/relocate: Fort Worth, TX 76036: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Experience: Embedded software (Preferred) Work Location: One location Speak with the employer +91 732-795-1268 If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
